'''''Vinyar Tengwar 31''''' is the thirty-first issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|30|32}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "''Sihe halpbruder''" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''Linga Mardin'' ('Deck the Halls')" — Christopher Gilson
* "''Antatye Voronwi'' ('Adeste Fideles')" — Christopher Gilson
* "The '[[King's Letter]]': An Historical and Comparative Analysis" — Carl F. Hostetter
